meanings.definition: To list or detail individual items
meanings.sent1: She itemizes all the groceries she bought.
meanings.sent2: The teacher itemizes the tasks for the students.
meanings.sent3: The detective itemizes the clues to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent4: His mind itemizes every detail of the plan.
meanings.sent5: The artist itemizes each stroke in the painting.

meanings.definition: To present a detailed list of items, expenses, or charges
meanings.sent1: The accountant itemizes the company's expenses for the month.
meanings.sent2: The receipt itemizes the cost of each item purchased.
meanings.sent3: The chef itemizes the ingredients used in the recipe.
meanings.sent4: The report itemizes the damages caused by the storm.
meanings.sent5: The bill itemizes the services provided by the plumber.
